subject: Track and Field
Prostheses
Disabilities
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Markus Rehm, a world-class German long jumper who uses a prosthetic blade, now finds himself in the same arena of confusion as Oscar Pistorius over how the line is drawn between able-bodied and disabled athletes.
snippet: Markus Rehm, a world-class German long jumper who uses a prosthetic blade, now finds himself in the same arena of confusion as Oscar Pistorius over how the line is drawn between able-bodied and disabled athletes.
